Text: What reuploads are you talking about in the description, and what was wrong with them?
The teenager is trying to act like a grown up with a toothless threat. There is nothing wrong with them. Ignore the little troll's comments in the future.

@drymoused Congratulations, you convinced me to stop uploading torrents both here and to the private trackers where coflvtg has been stealing my uploads from. You are right, it's "toothless." You will eventually get your porn, but you won't be getting it from me.

-empsvbest

Most of the fansadox uploads i see are marked anonymous, if you want the credit of uploading, why would you mark it like that?

In any case, I'd really appreciate it if you could upload 343. Thanks

@ drymoused
http://cdn.iwastesomuchtime.com/October-18-2011-20-12-49-DoubleFacePalm.jpg
Can't understand how you can be so dumb

@empsvbest
Thanks for all, you were great :-)

@empsvbest: If you want credit for your uploads, then upload them under your username instead of anonymously. If someone else reuploads the same file, so what? The whole ethos of the Scene is to share as much as possible. Moreover, if you just keep uploading files under your username before anyone else does, then you will build up a great reputation and big following and everyone will give props to you and download from you. :D

@empsvbest: If you want credit for your uploads, then upload them under your username instead of anonymously. If you just keep uploading files under your username before anyone else does, then you will build up a great reputation and big following and everyone will give props to you and download from you, and once that happens, who cares if anyone else reups?
